name: Heltow
description:
In Heltow you play the (short) adventure of Oreh, Worra, Egam and Draug. Use your best strategy to defeat their enemies on the battlefield and protect the towns in the region of Heltow. Level your units and buy them equipment to make 'em stronger.

This Game is the #3 in a "4 games in 4 weeks"-Project of mine. It therefore is just a small scale game with a handfull of maps to play. 

Notice regarding Web-Version:

Some Browsers (mostly Chrome) might have problems with running the game correctly. If this is the case for you, there's also a downloadable Windows-version available.
